OPENROUTER_API_KEY.description: API key used by the OpenRouter plugin for authenticating requests.

OPENROUTER_IMAGE_MODEL.description: Overrides the default image description model used by the OpenRouter plugin.

OPENROUTER_BASE_URL.description: Base URL for the OpenRouter API endpoints.

OPENROUTER_BROWSER_BASE_URL.description: Browser-only proxy endpoint base URL for OpenRouter requests (no secrets in the client).

OPENROUTER_SMALL_MODEL.description: Overrides the default small language model used for text/object generation.

OPENROUTER_LARGE_MODEL.description: Overrides the default large language model used for text/object generation.

SMALL_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the small model name when OPENROUTER_SMALL_MODEL is not set.

LARGE_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the large model name when OPENROUTER_LARGE_MODEL is not set.

IMAGE_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the image model name when OPENROUTER_IMAGE_MODEL is not set.

OPENROUTER_IMAGE_GENERATION_MODEL.description: Overrides the default image generation model used by the OpenRouter plugin.

IMAGE_GENERATION_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the image generation model name when OPENROUTER_IMAGE_GENERATION_MODEL is not set.

OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: Overrides the default text embedding model used by the OpenRouter plugin.

EMBEDDING_MODEL.description: General fallback environment variable for the embedding model name when OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_MODEL is not set.

OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: Number of dimensions for embedding vectors. Supported values: 256, 384, 512, 768, 1024, 1536, 2048, 3072.

EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS.description: General fallback environment variable for the embedding dimensions when OPENROUTER_EMBEDDING_DIMENSIONS is not set.

OPENROUTER_AUTO_CLEANUP_IMAGES.description: Whether to automatically cleanup generated images after a short delay.

OPENROUTER_TOOL_EXECUTION_MAX_STEPS.description: Maximum number of steps for multi-step tool execution. Allows the AI to generate descriptive text after calling tools in AI SDK v5.
